flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: I recently got into hobby electronics, and right now have most of the tools I need for projects. But I didn't want to go out and buy a breadboard because the only store that sells them is an hour drive away. So naturally, being a maker, I thought I would come up with my own idea to make one.
guide.introduction_rendered: I recently got into hobby electronics, and right now have most of the tools I need for projects. But I didn't want to go out and buy a breadboard because the only store that sells them is an hour drive away. So naturally, being a maker, I thought I would come up with my own idea to make one.
guide.title: Make your own Breadboard(household items)
